programme.title: Inauguration parade cancelled
programme.short_synopsis: Freezing weather forces cancellation of inauguration parade.
programme.medium_synopsis: Plunging temperatures force cancellation of Reagan's second term inauguration parade.
programme.long_synopsis:
Plunging temperatures force cancellation of Reagan's second term inauguration parade.

This archive edition of Letter from America was recorded by one of two listeners, who between them taped and labelled over 650 Letter From America programmes from 1973 to 1989. It was restored by the BBC in 2014.
